query.insert_history: INSERT INTO TBL_HISTORY_QUERY (USER_NUMBER, CUSTOMER_COMMENT, CHATBOT_COMMENT_CODE, CHANNEL, RESPONSE_TIME, REG_DATE, ACTIVE_FLAG) VALUES ( @userNumber, @customerComment, @chatbotCommentCode, 'WEB', @responseTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEADD(Hour, 9,GETDATE()), 101)+' '+CONVERT(VARCHAR, DATEADD(Hour, 9,GETDATE()), 24), 0)
